```{r}
#| warning: false
library(palmerpenguins)
penguins <- palmerpenguins::penguins
```

# Penguin bill depth vs length

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Penguin bill depth vs length"
plot(x = penguins$bill_length_mm,
y = penguins$bill_depth_mm, 
main = "Penguin bill dimensions",
sub = "Data source: Palmer Penguins")

```
# Penguin mean and median body mass

```{r}
#| results: hold
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)
median(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)
```
# How many penguins are there in each island?


```{r}
#| label: n_penguins_in_islands
#| tbl-cap: "Number of penguins in each island"
island_counts <- table(penguins$island)
knitr::kable(island_counts, col.names = c("Island", "Number of penguins"))
```


# Is the average weight of penguins the same across all three islands?

```{r echo=FALSE}
#| fig-cap: "Penguin body mass by island"
plot(x = penguins$island, 
     y = penguins$body_mass_g, 
     ylab = "Body mass (g)", 
     xlab = "Island",
     col(c(6, 3, 4)))
abline(h = mean(penguins$body_mass_g,na.rm = TRUE), col = 2, lwd = 2)
```
